messages.content: You are a helpful English language assistant.

This is an atomic edit extraction task. Given a pair of English sentences and a list of edits, your task is to extract atomic edits and assign each edit a label. Be case sensitive. Pay attention to punctuation marks and relocated tokens (relocated tokens should not be changed before and after being relocated). Pay attention to phonetic similarity when aligning tokens.
Sentence pair:
But Generally speaking, travelling by car is much more fun when compared with other modes of transport.
But generally speaking, travelling by car is much more fun when compared with other modes of transport.
list of edits:
('replace', 'Generally', 'generally')
['replace', 'Generally', 'generally']
You are a helpful English language assistant.

I had made a decision I was going to do it. If he dedicated 4 years of his life to torturing me and not wanting me to be happy, the time is necessary for him to have a miserable life and I won't stop until I have accomplished my goal.
